sqlMap.statement:
SELECT A.INTFC_ID AS INTFC_ID, A.INTFC_ID_DESC_TXT AS INTFC_ID_DESC_TXT FROM( SELECT MIIC.INTFC_ID AS INTFC_ID, MIIC.INTFC_ID_DESC_TXT AS INTFC_ID_DESC_TXT FROM MDB_INBD_INTFC_CONFIG MIIC WHERE MIIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND MIIC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND MIIC.INTFC_ID LIKE #cMsg.intfcId#
ORDER BY MIIC.INTFC_ID ASC ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #rowNum#
